about.par1: I like being able to materialize my ideas and help others to develop theirs. Always learning, I am a self-taught person who is passionate about finding creative and original solutions hand in hand with optimal results. Plus, I want to be able to contribute to the proper development and use of digital technologies.
about.par2: If you have a great idea and want to carry it out, I hope you will contact me!

ui_ux.title: UI/UX Design
items: Define the type of user to whom the product is directed.
Collaborate with other designers and marketing specialists.
Build a solid engagement between the product and the user.

web.title: Web Development
items: Editing, writing, or designing Website content.
Identifying and correcting bugs and issues.
Determine user needs by technical requirements.

systems.title: Systems Design
items: Data entry and management of databases.
Troubleshooting and finding solutions for possible issues.

footer.inspo: Inspired by an EGATOR's React Website design.
